original_text: You cheat poor people so that they pay too much tax. You take away their food for yourselves. Because of that, you will not live in the beautiful houses that you have built for yourselves. You will not drink wine from the vines that you have planted. You cheat poor people so that they pay too much tax. You take away their food for yourselves. Because of that, you will not live in the beautiful houses that you have built for yourselves. You will not drink wine from the vines that you have planted.
korean_text: 너희가 힘없는 자를 밟고 그에게서 밀의 부당한 세를 거두었은즉 너희가 비록 다듬은 돌로 집을 건축하였으나 거기 거주하지 못할 것이요 아름다운 포도원을 가꾸었으나 그 포도주를 마시지 못하리라

sentences.original_text: so that they pay too much tax
sentences.korean_translation: 그들이 너무 많은 세금을 내게 하기 위해

sentences.original_text: You take away their food for yourselves
sentences.korean_translation: 당신은 자신들을 위해 그들의 음식을 빼앗습니다

sentences.original_text: you will not live in the beautiful houses
sentences.korean_translation: 당신은 아름다운 집들에 살지 못할 것입니다

sentences.original_text: that you have built for yourselves
You will not drink wine from the vines
sentences.korean_translation: 당신은 포도나무에서 포도주를 마시지 못할 것입니다

sentences.original_text: so that they pay too much tax
sentences.korean_translation: 그들이 너무 많은 세금을 내게 하기 위해
